title: CFP quarterfinal takeaways: Ole Miss' wild upset, Indiana's dominance and more
description: The semifinals are now set. We go inside every quarterfinal game to see how we got our final four.

title: Golding, Rebels continue 'special' run, oust UGA

title: Kiffin's assistants in flux as Ole Miss advances
description: Shortly after Pete Golding and Ole Miss finished an upset of Georgia on Thursday, a source told ESPN's Mark Schlabach to expect some "fireworks," as LSU coach Lane Kiffin decides how many of his assistants can remain with the Rebels for the CFP semifinal.

title: IU tops Tide in 'dream come true'; Ducks up next
